RelatedSentence: Following the first round of local elections held in Greece on May 18 , governing coalition parties New Democracy and PASOK as well as main opposition SYRIZA apparently had something to cheer about .
SYRIZA was successful in reaching the target the party had set of their candidates reaching the second round in the municipality of Athens and the Attica prefecture .
